slides.hed: Do this quick challenge, and I can tell if you are over 60*

slides.name: flip
slides.prompt: Give me the most random looking sequence of 12 coin flips that you can think of.

slides.name: spot
slides.prompt: Give me the most random looking sequence of 10 spots that you can think of.

slides.name: roll
slides.prompt: Give me the most random looking sequence of 10 dice rolls that you can think of.
